title: "This AI Startup Has Saved Grocers From Tossing Millions Of Pounds Of Food"
excerpt: "It means that fruits and veggies are not sitting around for nearly as long at grocers like Cub, a Minnesota chain with 100 stores, which is moving produce in and out of its stores 7% faster than before. The retailer has also seen a nice 2.5% boost in sales from improving its in-stock levels."
